about_the_game:
Beautiful Nonsense contains 24 unusual arts. This enchanting collection invites you to explore a world of vibrant colors, surreal landscapes, and fantastical creatures that defy the laws of reality.



This DLC contains collection of fantasy artworks created for entertainment purposes. The imaginative and fantastical nature of the artworks is intended solely for the enjoyment of viewers.
Notice:
No Intent to Offend or Upset: The artworks in this pack are not created with the intention of offending or upsetting any individual or group. They are a product of creativity and are not meant to convey any harmful messages. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
The content may include themes such as mythical creatures, magical settings, and fictional scenarios. These elements are part of the fantasy genre and are not reflective of reality.
Viewer Discretion: While efforts have been made to ensure that the content remains within the bounds of general acceptability, viewer discretion is advised, as individual sensitivities may vary.
By accessing and using this DLC, you acknowledge that the artworks are presented for artistic and entertainment purposes only. We disclaim any responsibility for unintended interpretations or reactions.
